name: donjolly
text: A comment left by donjolly was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by king_of_pwns, Rainwolfj, Panserbjorne, STUART)

name: okl
text: just amazing

name: theoverpowered
text: A comment left by theoverpowered was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, keithcozz, gorrioncita)

name: norrin
text: Do you have to explain this to guests all the time?

name: saint
text: do you derive a sense of security from this?

name: aggro-lite
text: I would like to steal this idea. But the square is so small.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: A comment left by cpnglxynchos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, soup_alex, trisha, Sleaw, Pie4me6)

name: woodenteeth
text: cpnglxynchos... really?

name: jamers
text: Ray may be in bad straits, but he is not about to compromise the sanctity of his pepper.

name: mrsmuckles
text: Beef's a great friend. Much respect.

name: behka
text: exactly.  Keep On Rockin, Roast Beef.

name: wehavemagnums
text: One of the greatest Achewood strips ever.

name: prufrock
text: It is a psychological insight to know that when thinking about people who have made good lives, Pesci (of Lethal Weapon fame)come to mind before Billy Gates.  "You diss my dogg, you fluff my hogg"

name: davidbowie
text: A comment left by davidbowie was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, ShemmJacc, Sakana, craigola)

name: saurkraus
text: This is what I love about so many Achewood strips, particularly ones that feature Roast Beef: hilarious pop culture references and comparisons between them and the characters that come out of nowhere

name: sherwood
text: Not to insinuate that good humor is that which draws upon a particularly unrepresented but uniting personal experience BUT .... we've all let our peppers touch the rim before.

name: shemmjacc
text: my pepper usually touches the rim

name: dans
text: Am I the only one that puts toliet paper on the rim before sitting down in public restrooms? I always hoped that was just a thing people did.

name: terribleman
text: I don't sit down in public restrooms. It's a thing.

name: stormagnet
text: Nope. Can't say I have.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: it has happened, yes.

name: dybrar
text: Are you saying that your rim has had peper?

name: satch
text: Not at a dang Friendly's in hell man!

name: trollcollins
text:
"Some men such as Joe Pescie and Bill Gates have created good lives for themselves.

I am about to [DO A RIDICULOUS ACTION]

Keepn on rockin', [ME]."

This has become an excellent catchphrase (or, rather . . . catch . . . sentences) among certain of my friends. I 100% approve!

name: nabeel84
text: I hope you have a two syllable name, or it would sound weird.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Roast Beef was always so good at Operation.

name: 1000hz
text:
oh man the nose is blinking
I cold killed him
I cold killed a man

name: envika
text: chubby

name: zem
text: nice

name: raychurr
text: His PEPPER, man!

name: woodenteeth
text: I once found my younger brother at age 18 entirely smashed, entirely passed out, entirely dick out on the toilet. Blank faced, I turned around and walked straight back out. Blood is not necessarily thicker than water apparently.

name: heccibiggs
text:
I don't think any of us blame you.

I just considered the situation for myself and experienced a three-second-long involuntary shudder. Although, to be fair, I'm a chick.

name: woodenteeth
text: I'm a dude so I repressed my shudder into a stony silence and dull life-less eyes.

name: atypicaloracle
text: You have proved yourself a coward who would abandon a man passed out on the can.

name: aperson
text: Sign me up for that club.

name: woodenteeth
text: No signatures necessary, please just present your dignity.

name: hughnin
text: I can imagine this strip fading to black with "keep on rockin' in the free world" playing. Roast beef kneeling down to get the tube, then darkness.

name: slab64
text: Still better than the Sopranos finale.

name: skoora
text: Is his pepper as rad as his chilies?

name: catgrl131
text: Yes, but not as rad as the hybrid "Chili Pepper"

name: laikalost
text:
Keep on rockin' Roast Beef.

I didn't think I could love Beef more that I already did -- and then I read this script. You keep right on rockin' dogg.

name: laikalost
text: Script?  "Strip"  Well, you guys know what I meant.

name: deovalente
text: Ray is passed out drunk until he senses the danger of his Pepper possibly touching the rim, then he is wide awake.

name: spinynorman
text:
The man thinks with the most protuberant part of his body. And it isn't his nose.

(Hint - it's his pepper)

name: epicurus
text: I think his huge brie-belly is probably actually in the #1 slot for protuberance.

name: spinynorman
text:
You never know.

...No, I am really not going to start to hypothesize about the size of Ray's penis. No thanks, I'm just... I'm just gonna go wash my hands, friends... With disinfectant. The purell they use at area 51

name: epicurus
text: Man don't wuss out now, we're making history with this!

name: eatmorekix
text: ok sorry i'm a girl so i don't really get it. why would your pepper touch the rim? i dunno...i feel like it would be easy to sit up without this happening?

name: hellofditties
text: He is a cat.  Who knows?

name: charchar
text: As a girl and a low-grade perv, I'm going to hypothesise that as Ray passed out, he leaned forward a ways, causing his junket to fall within the rim's grasp. Boys, please send an envoy or suchlike to explain this to us.

name: mattylite
text: Imagine the perfect harmonic motion of a pendulum.

name: charchar
text: Must I?

name: fineoakstructure
text: You muft .

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Ugh, I pulled a "muft" joke?

I guess my only consolation is that I did this before it became an automatic assetbar response to any post with the word "must" in it. But still, I disapprove, Year Ago Me, Probably Drunk.

name: layzerblade
text: 4 chubbies, 0 lames. If they like it, why apologize?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
because it makes me feel empty inside dammit

i care not for the whims and fancies of hoi polloi or you know whatever

name: aperson
text: You absolutely muft not care for those whims and fancies.

name: fineoakstructure
text: THESE KNIVES

name: aperson
text: {sob}

name: layzerblade
text: It is not a player's way to apologize unbidden. If it pleased them, let them enjoy it.

name: snowman
text: If you are relatively careful, you're right -- pepper-to-rim contact is pretty easy to avoid.  But sometimes it does happen before you realize it, and this is gross, particularly in a public restroom.  The idea that you couldn't move or it would touch is unlikely, but that's kind of what makes this funny.

name: mercuri0us
text: Basically it depends on how drunk you are.  And the size of your pepper.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: Is so awesome.

name: drago25
text:
Man, Ray is still cool even in the most compromising, undignified position ever.

And that last line is just something special.

name: canusdivinus
text: The toilets in Hell are constantly out of toilet paper. Bastards.

name: wonelove
text: and when there is toilet paper, it has a sandpapery quality to it

name: daidai
text: And it falls apart instantly

name: johnnybaverage
text: And you can only ever grab one square at a time.

name: wonelove
text:
This is where dexterity comes into play.
And flexible fingers.

name: comrade_tom
text: In his lax moments Ray refers to it as his "Rowdy Roddy"

name: drskradley
text: Nobody has mentioned that Joe Pesci's career isn't exactly amazing.

name: drskradley
text:
I take this back. I looked at his filmography, and Academy Awards and stuff - his career would be considered "good" at the very least.

My previous post makes it clear that I am not exactly an aficionado of mob movies. I have only seen him in Lethal Weapon and some crappy movies. It'd be like judging Sean Connery based purely on LXG and Highlander.

name: tekende
text: Do not ever mention LXG again. That movie does not exist, you hear me? IT DOES NOT EXIST.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Please, do yourself a favor, and watch Raging Bull.

name: octafish
text:
I got these small hands. I got a little girl's hands.

YOU NEVER KNOCKED ME DOWN RAY! YOU HEAR? YOU NEVER KNOCKED ME DOWN.

name: woodenteeth
text: Please do not speak ill of Highlander (well, the first one anyway, all the rest are low grade meth lab concoctions). If only for the reason that "It's a Kind of Magic" is one of the best Queen Albums of all time.

name: ravigotte
text: Ordered a framed and signed version of this as a Christmas present for my cousin. Because this is the exact type of situation we could have been in (except the whole "being in hell" part).

name: quinlaenar
text: Liar. You visit hell as often as Todd.

name: ouroboros
text: panel 7 is the best example of true friendship i have ever seen.

name: kotoku
text: Roast Beef is a good friend.

name: sevenslashfour
text:
I first read Achewood years and years ago. It's been ages. I am now re-reading through from the beginning. But, for whatever reason, in all the time I'd spent... well, not reading it, whenever I thought of Achewood, this is the strip that usually came to mind.

Keep on rockin' Roast Beef.

name: mercurcia
text: As a female, I don't know for sure, but I have heard tales of this genital-tube thing.  Keep on rockin' Roast Beef.

name: woodenteeth
text: This trick is for either a) a person with no ability to do a basic squat-style lift b) an incredibly large penis which is basically unable to squish down and away from the rim (and in that case, how did you thread it down there in the first place or c) someone with incredibly reduced motor skills (i.e. Ray in this strip).
